companies.name: Tourism companies
companies.title: Tourism companies
companies.intro: We encourage travel related businesses and companies to participate in the Travel Gift and welcome Icelanders travelling domestically.
companies.description: Companies can sign up for participation on Ísland.is. The company's authorised signer has to submit the application using his or her personal electronic certificate (rafræn skilríki). The company will receive an automatic confirmation for registration and gain access to an online account, containing data on the amount of Travel Gifts used with the company.

notes.label: Companies have three possibilities to receive Travel Gifts:
items: Scan a bar code from the app
Scan a bar code number to a browser
Direct connection to a booking system
notes.disclaimer: Please note that bar codes must be scanned shortly after activation, as each bar code is only active for a few minutes.

items.label: Which companies qualify for the Travel Gift?
contents: All companies meeting one of the following conditions, operating in Iceland, can sign up:
Companies holding a valid permit issued by the Icelandic Tourist Board (Ferðamálastofa) in accordance with Chapter III of Act No. 96/2018 on the Icelandic Tourist Board.
Companies holding a valid operating licence in accordance to Article 7 of Act No. 85/2007 on Restaurants, Accommodation and Festivities.

Companies holding a valid permit issued by an appropriate board of health applying to restaurants in category I, as in subsection 3, Article 4 of Act No. 85/2007 on Restaurants, Accommodation and Festivities.
Car rentals holding a valid permit issued by the Icelandic Transport Authority in accordance with subsection 1, Article 3 of Act No. 65/2015 on Car rentals.
Museums and business establishments selling entry to exhibitions focusing on Icelandic culture, history or nature.
Please contact grunnur@ferdamalastofa.is for more information.

items.label: What is the maximum amount in ISK each company is allowed to receive through the Travel Gift?
contents: The Travel Gift is an official state aid according to the EEA agreement. According to temporary regulations on state aids due to the COVID-19 epidemic, from 19. March 2020, a company is allowed to accept Travel Gifts equivalent to a maximum of 100.000.000 ISK. A company that was facing operational difficulties on 31. December 2019, according to the EU Block Exemption Regulation No. 651/2014, can accept a maximum of 25.000.000 ISK.

A company was considered having operational difficulties at that time if it met at least one of the following conditions, as per regulations on state aids to mitigate the economic effect due to the COVID-19 epidemic:
The corporation has limited liability, and carried equity according to acknowledged accounting principles is less than half of proceeds from issue of capital stock, including share premium account.

At least one member of the corporation carries unlimited liability, and carried equity according to acknowledged accounting principles is less than half of proceeds from issue of capital stock, including share premium account.
The corporation is undergoing liquidation or meets the requirements of bankruptcy proceedings as per creditor's request.

The corporation has received corporate rescue as defined by EFTA's rescuing and restructuring aid, and has yet to make the loan payment or relieve liability, or has received restructuring aid and is still bound by a restructuring programme.

The following applies to 2 previous financial years: a) the debt-to-equity ratio is higher than 7,5 and b) earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization (EBITDA) is lower than the annual net cost of capital.
Conditions (1) and (2) do not apply to small or medium-sized businesses that have been operating for less than 3 years.
Condition (5) does not apply to small or medium-sized businesses.
Businesses are defined as small or medium-sized according to Act No. 3/2006 on annual financial statements.

items.label: How do I establish a direct connection to a booking system?
contents: Companies can directly connect the Travel Gift to their own register- or booking system. This way, the Travel Gift bar code can be used when booking online.
Please contact info@yay.is for more details on direct connection.

items.label: How do I handle settlements and accounting?
contents: Settlements and accounting.
Travel related businesses and companies receive a monthly report on the number of Travel Gifts used to purchase services.
Travel related businesses and companies receive a monthly payment in accordance with the report.

items.label: How do I monitor the Travel Gifts used with my company?
contents: All registered companies have access to an online account where they can monitor all Travel Gifts received as payment. When a gift is used to purchase services, it appears on the company's report.

items.label: How do I apply for the appropriate permit?
contents: Those who seek to operate a travel or tourist agency in accordance with Chapter III, Act No. 96/2018, should hold the appropriate permit issued by the Icelandic Tourist Board. See www.ferdamalastofa.is/is/leyfi-og-loggjof/ferdasali-dagsferda/unsoknarferlill

Those who seek to operate accommodation facilities in categories II-IV in accordance with Article 7 of Act No. 85/2007 on Restaurants, Accommodation and Festivities, should hold the appropriate permit issued by District Magistrates. See www.syslumenn.is/thjonusta/leyfi-og-loggildingar/veitingaleyfi

Those who seek to operate food services in category I in accordance with subsection 3, Article 4 of Act No. 85/2007 on Restaurants, Accommodation and Festivities, should hold the appropriate permit. Please contact your Local Authorities' board of health.

Car rentals should hold a valid permit issued by the Icelandic Transport Authority in accordance with subsection 1, Article 3 of Act No. 65/2015. on Car rentals. See www.samgongustofa.is/umferd/leyfi-og-eftirlit

videos.label: How do I scan a Travel Gift using the app?
How do I enter the Travel Gift barcode to a browser?

home.name: Travel Gift
home.title: A gift for domestic traveling
home.intro: Create memories while domestically traveling, and support Icelandic tourism
description: All individuals with legal residence in Iceland, born 2002 and earlier, can recieve a 5,000 kr. Travel Gift. The gift is a part of supporing Icelandic tourism following the COVID-19 epidemic, and encourage Icelanders to have quality times while traveling domestically. Further information can be sought at ferðalag.is.
When a gift is sought, a corresponding Travel Gift will be created using the owner's personal phone number

items.label: Who can receive a Travel Gift?
contents: Individuals with a legal recidence in Iceland, an Icelandic SSN, and born 2002 or earlier, can receive a Travel Gift.

items.label: How do I get my Travel Gift?
contents: The gift needs to be fetched at Ísland.is with a personal electronic certificate (rafræn skilríki).
From there you can either download the Ferðagjöf app from App Store or Play Store; or simply use your Travel Gift from Ísland.is, and scan the barcode upon purchase

items.label: What if I don't have a smart device?
contents: The Travel Gift can be sought at Ísland.is using a computer. To use your Travel gift, you can purchase from companies websites (for those that support it); you can call tourism companies and give up the barcode number; or simply login to Ísland.is from a computer and generate the barcode at the tourism company site. We do not recomment printing out the barcode, since each barcode only lasts for 15 minutes.

items.label: Where can I use my Travel Gift?
contents: Travel Gifts can be used at tourism companies that have signed up for the Travel Gift's participation. You can view the full list of available companies at ferðalag.is.

items.label: Can I give away my Travel Gift?
contents: We encourage everyone to use your own Travel Gift, but giving it away is permitted. Each individual can give or use at a maximum 15 Travel Gifts within the expiration date of the Travel Gift.

items.label: What is the expiration date of the Travel Gift?
contents: The Travel Gift expires after 31st of May, 2021.

noConnection.content: You are not registered as a procuration holder, please contact the Skattur

companySignup.intro: Which company do you want to register?
companySignup.caption: If your company does not show up, then you are not a procuration holder for that company, please contact RSK for further information

congratulations.title: Congratulations!
congratulations.intro: Now you can proceed to the company website manager
congratulations.description: From the website, you can monitor the Travel Gift's usage, enter barcodes, and create accounts.
congratulations.button: Continue to the company website manager
contents: You'll recieve an email from YaY ehf. with access information for your company. YaY is the Travel Gift's technical supplier, as well as handling the company website and developing the app for users.
The Icelandic Tourist Board (Ferðamálastofa) handles all company registration inspection. If companies do not have the right license, their Travel Gift account will be closed.

notQualified.title: Sorry
notQualified.intro: Your company unfortunately does not meet the conditions to participate in the Travel Gift.
notQualified.description: Individuals can use the Travel Gift at companies in Iceland, that fulfill one of the following conditions:
conditions: Companies holding a valid permit issued by the Icelandic Tourist Board (Ferðamálastofa) in accordance with Chapter III of Act No. 96/2018 on the Icelandic Tourist Board.
Companies holding a valid operating licence in accordance to Article 7 of Act No. 85/2007 on Restaurants, Accommodation and Festivities.

Companies holding a valid permit issued by an appropriate board of health applying to restaurants in category I, as in subsection 3, Article 4 of Act No. 85/2007 on Restaurants, Accommodation and Festivities.
Car rentals holding a valid permit issued by the Icelandic Transport Authority in accordance with subsection 1, Article 3 of Act No. 65/2015 on Car rentals.
Museums and business establishments selling entry to exhibitions focusing on Icelandic culture, history or nature.
notQualified.caption: Further information and questions should go to Ferðamálastofa, grunnur@ferdamalastofa.is

operationsTrouble.label: Was your company facing operational difficulties on December 31st 2019, according to the EU Block Exemption Regulation?
operationsTrouble.tooltip: A company that was facing operational difficulties on 31. December 2019, according to the EU Block Exemption Regulation No. 651/2014, can accept a maximum of 25.000.000 ISK.

gotPublicHelp.label: Has your company, in the last 2 financial years, had any official help which falls under the Commission Regulation in regards of EES No. 1407/2013?
gotPublicHelp.tooltip: An example can be closing grants, supporing loands, payments with Travel Gifts, company- or pioneers-grants from Rannís, exhibition-grants from Kvikmyndamiðstöð Íslands, transporting-grants from Byggðastofnun, grants in regards of region reactions, and grants from Framkvæmdasjóði ferðamannastaða.

user.title: Congratulations, your travel gift is here!
user.intro: To use the Travel Gift download the Ferðagjöf app, available for both Apple iOS and Android. In the app, you can purchase using the Travel Gift, see an overview of tourism companies available, or give away the Travel Gift. If you prefer to use the website instead of the app, you can create a barcode down below.

appStore.title: Download the app for Apple iOS or Android.
appStore.content: You can also search for „Ferðagjöf“ in Apple's App Store and/or Google Play Store.

barcode.title: Travel Gift in a barcode
barcode.intro: To use the gift, allow your vendor to scan the barcode. Some tourism companies allow entering the barcode number on their websites to purchase products.

error.title: An error occurred
error.message: Something went wrong while fetching your barcode, please try again.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy policy
sections: When using the Ferðagjöf app, information regarding the SSN (kennitala), phone number and email address of the user are registered in a database owned by the Ministry of Industry and Innovation. The information will be used to give overview of the usage and distribution of the gift while the gift is valid according to the law on Ferðagjöf from the 12th of June, 2020. The information stored in the database will only be used by the ministry to verify the usage of the Travel Gift.

The registering of information in the database and usage of them in the app are in accordance with the laws on Ferðagjöf, as well as the EEA rules on state aid, and are based on the 3rd and 5th paragraph of article 9 in Act 90/2018 on Data Protection and the Processing of Personal data.

The Ministry of Industry and Innovation, Skúlagata 4, 101 Reykjavík, is the responsible party when it comes to the processing of personal data in connection to Ferðagjöf. The database is owned by the ministry and the ministry is responsible for its data. The database is however hosted by YAY ehf. Information from the database will not be distributed except by statutory requirements. You can contact the ministry by phone: 5459700, or via email: anr@anr.is.

Further information regarding processing of personal information within the Government of Iceland can be found in its privacy policy and laws on personal data protection, e.g. retention periods and the rights of individuals. Further information regarding the processing of personal information with YAY ehf., the company that develops and hosts Ferðagjöf by an agreement with the Icelandic government, can be found in the privacy policy of the company, https://www.yay.is/Docs/Privacy.

validation.phoneNumber: The phone number needs to be seven digits
validation.email: The email address is not valid
